events.message: I just received my order, but the item is damaged and has multiple scratches on the surface. I am very disappointed.
The reported issue has been assessed and categorized under product defect due to reported scratches and damages.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the damaged item received by the customer.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your item. I’m here to help you get this resolved as soon as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged product and your order number so we can investigate the issue further?
I have attached photos showing the scratches and damage, and my order number is 23456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product at no extra charge or a full refund if you prefer. Let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to proceed with a replacement, please send it as soon as possible. Thank you for your prompt assistance.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We appreciate your patience and understanding.
Just checking in to ensure that the replacement product arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
As we have not received further concerns, we have now closed this case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
